text: Emanuel Perathoner (born 12 May 1986) is an Italian snowboarder.Profile at FIS portal He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. He participated at the FIS Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding World Championships 2019, winning a medal.Snowboard cross results ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Italian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Italy Category:Sportspeople from Bolzano Category:Germanophone Italian people
title: Emanuel Perathoner
